mapper.select: SELECT tc.category_id, tc.category_name, tc.remarks, tc.created_at, tc.updated_at, ms.status_id, ms.status_name FROM t_category tc INNER JOIN m_status ms ON tc.status_id = ms.status_id WHERE true AND tc.category_id = #{categoryId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_category (category_name, status_id, remarks) VALUES (#{category.categoryName}, #{category.statusId}, #{category.remarks})
mapper.update: UPDATE t_category SET category_name = #{category.categoryName}, status_id = #{category.statusId}, remarks = #{category.remarks}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE category_id = #{category.categoryId}
